ca.uhn.hl7v2.hoh.encoder

Class AbstractHl7OverHttpEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uhn.hl7v2.hoh.encoder.AbstractHl7OverHttpEncoder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hl7OverHttpRequestEncoder, Hl7OverHttpResponseEncoder

    public abstract class AbstractHl7OverHttpEncoder
extends Object
    Base class that creates HL7 over HTTP requests. This class is intended to be single use, so please create a new instance for each message.

        Returns:

      • setCharset

        @Deprecated
public void setCharset(Charset theCharset)
        Deprecated. The HL7 over HTTP specification now mandates the use of UTF-8. Using this method to set a value other than UTF-8 will lead to a non-conformant application
        Parameters:
        theCharset - The encoding charset to use (default is UTF-8)
